body_html:
I guess my point is, if we're building without GPU support, how useful is
this test anyway -- shoudn't it be disabled whenever cuda support is off?

And if so, how would we do that? The py_cuda_tests only enable cuda, they
don't disable tests without cuda.

On Thu, Feb 4, 2016 at 1:14 PM Vijay Vasudevan notifications@github.com
wrote:

(and I am not sure how to disable this only on mac yet.. I can look into
it)

—
Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
#965 (comment)
.

I guess my point is, if we're building without GPU support, how useful is
this test anyway -- shoudn't it be disabled whenever cuda support is off?

And if so, how would we do that? The py_cuda_tests only enable cuda, they
don't disable tests without cuda.
